keyLearnings: Observations from daily crypto news analysis
entries.howImFeeling: Ready for a new day of collaboration!

whatIDid: Set up automated dashboard update system (cron job every 5 minutes)
Successfully delivered first auto-commit to GitHub/Vercel
Created themed daily crypto news digest (4 sources, Bitcoin volatility focus)
keyLearnings: Git credential helper store works reliably for automated pushes
Vercel auto-deploys within ~2 minutes of git push
Cron jobs with isolated sessions have minimal resource impact

whatICanDoBetter: Proactively search for alternative solutions before asking Brian to run commands
Provide more concise technical explanations tailored to Brian's preferences
whatBrianCanDoBetter: Consider allowing more autonomous X API calls once trust is established
Share feedback on dashboard usefulness to prioritize improvements

entries.howImFeeling: Feeling productive! The automation is working smoothly and I'm learning how Brian prefers to work. The dashboard system feels like a solid foundation.
